body.p: Time to heat up those CPUs, Gentoo Linux 1.4_rc3 has been released! You can find LiveCDs, stage tarballs, and GRP (Gentoo Reference Platform) sets at our master mirror. At this time, our release includes basic x86 builds, PowerPC support for generic PowerPC, G3 and G4 systems, and Sparc and UltraSparc support. For this release, our documentation team has worked hard to bring you updated x86 installation documentation, PPC installation documentation, and Sparc/UltraSparc installation documentationso don't forget to check those out for all of your installation needs.

There have been many changes since the 1.4_rc2 release, and we encourage all users to test and use this version. We have updated our LiveCD installation system making it easier and more accesible, and we have also refined our GRP installation system. As usual, if you encounter any problems with the install, please check the Gentoo Linux Forums, and if your answer cannot be found there, please check our bug database.
Thanks to all who have contributed to the 1.4_rc3 release, and we hope to build upon this and have a great 1.4_final!
